answers.answer: It's cool u get to get one tomorrow, I just had my 32 week check up Wednesday and I didn't get one, I only have had 2, I think that's just how my doc is tho cuz it was the same with my first last year. But yeah they will definitely be able to tell u if anything is wrong physically, I'm not sure about mental though. I am sure everything is good though :) good luck
I mean ive had a real heathy and  normal pregnancy so far so i don't see why anything would be wrong. Im just so nervous

Yeah, I totally understand. I'm nervous all the time about is my baby ok, if he's not moving a lot or something like that. Even though I know the movements get less and less towards the end. Mine is partly because I had my first son at 36 weeks and he was in the nicu for 21 days. It was scary and definitely not how I wanted my first delivery to go. But he actually did really good. Most of the time he was in there we were just waiting on him to be able to regulate his body temperature on its own. All nicu babies have to be able to do that before they can be sent home. His lungs weren't fully developed at birth and that's why he had to be in to begin with, bit after a week he was breathing on his own perfectly. So it wasn't that bad. But I'm nervous now because my doc thinks I will have this one at 34 weeks, I'm already 1.5 and 50% effaced and if i keep going at this rate it won't be too long. But thankfully, I got a shot for the baby's lungs so maybe he won't have to be in the hospital that ling if at all. Sorry I kinda babbled LOL
Aw thats so sad :( but atleast ur baby is healthy. Thats all that matters

Not to rain on your parade or anything but its normal to not have another sonogram after 20 weeks if you're having a healthy pregnancy and your doctor doesn't think you're too big or small for your due date. Every pregnancy is different. The same doctor could do things completely different with you than they did with someone else. They usually tell you if you're going to have a sonogram. Just don't count your chickens before they hatch, I don't want you to be disappointed.
Yea i know i dont wanna get my hopes up but im gonna try and convince him

Im almost 33 weeks and the only reason I'll be getting another one is because I have gestational diabetes. I'm having the scan at 35-36weeks to check his size.  My Dr said if I didn't have diabetes I wouldn't have had another scan.
I had one at 32 weeks just to check the weight and size and fluid that's probably all it is. I think some docs do that just to make sure baby is gaining right

I have had 5 since i found out about being pregnant but dont really know why? I dont know if it is because this is my first oregnancy after a miscarriage on top of being RH neg and the father being positive? They never really said and i never asked because it is nice to see my baby girl :) but she has been perfect so im not sure if we will have anymore tests etc done.. im 32 weeks! :)
Im having one in 5 days. Im 32+4 & they will do one at 33+2 because my placenta is grated and to make sure my daughter is growing at the rate she should :/  nervous but I just wanna know shes ok:)
Yea thats what she said it was for. To check the fluids and weight n stuff

question: Im excited but i have kinda a weird question. I havent had a sonogram since 20 Weeks. And my friend who had the same Dr as me told me i will be getting another sonogram tomorrow. Well my question is would they be able to tell if anything was wrong with my baby at my last sonogram? Like physical and mental? I had a specialist do my 20 week scan so i wont be surprised with anything tomorrow other than how much he has grown? Im sure everything is great im just worrying cause I'm a ftm and havent seen him in a long time.
title: 32 week check up tomorrow!
